reaction.ranaway/2: Kalau kau kembali, aku akan panggil penjaga!
reaction.ranaway/3: Kembalilah dan lawan aku seperti lelaki!
reaction.ranaway/4: Kalau aku lihat kamu lagi, aku akan tonjok kau!
reaction.ranaway/5: Aku tahu kau selalu takut padaku!
reaction.ranaway/6: Kenapa kau lari? Kembali ke sini agar aku bisa tonjok kau!
reaction.ranaway/7: Aku akan tonjok kau kalau aku melihat kau lagi!
reaction.ranaway/8: Aku akan gabungin teman-temanku dan hajarinmu!
villager.warning/1: I'm warning you, don't attack our people!
villager.hurt/2: Aku akan mendapatkan kau untuk itu!
villager.hurt/6: Hei! Apa yang kamu pikir kamu lakukan?!
villager.badly_hurt/4: They're going to kill me! Someone help!
villager.badly_hurt/5: You can take whatever you want, just please don't hurt me!
villager.badly_hurt/6: I don't want to die! Stay away!
villager.sickness/6: Apakah ini... Ayah? Apakah itu kau?
villager.inventory.full/1: Aku tidak bisa membawa lebih banyak
spouse.chore.mining.nopick: Aku lupa membawa pangkurku, sayang, apakah kamu membawa satu lagi?
spouse.chore.chopping.noaxe: Oh, aku kira kita akan pergi piknik. Aku tidak membawa kapak...
spouse.chore.fishing.norod: Dengan senang hati! Tapi, aku tidak bisa menemukan tongkat pancingku.
spouse.chore.hunting.nosword: Pedangku rusak kemarin. Apakah kamu memiliki pedang satu lagi?
spouse.chore.harvesting.nohoe: Apakah kamu memiliki cangkul lain yang aku bisa gunakan?
childp.chore.mining.orenotify: Sepertinya ada beberapa %2$s di dekat sini...
childp.chore.mining.nopick: Aku tidak bisa melakukan itu tanpa kapak!
childp.chore.chopping.noaxe: Aku tidak bisa menebang pohon tanpa kapak...
childp.chore.fishing.norod: Aku tidak bisa memancing tanpa tongkat pancing!
childp.chore.hunting.nosword: Apakah kamu bisa memberiku sebuah pedang terlebih dahulu?
childp.chore.harvesting.nohoe: Aku tidak memiliki cangkul untuk memanen.
child.chore.mining.orenotify: Sepertinya ada beberapa %2$s di dekat sini...
child.chore.mining.nopick: Aku tidak bisa melakukan itu tanpa pangkur!
child.chore.chopping.noaxe: Aku tidak bisa menebang pohon tanpa kapak...
child.chore.fishing.norod: Aku tidak bisa memancing tanpa tongkat pancing!
child.chore.hunting.nosword: Apakah kamu bisa memberiku sebuah pedang terlebih dahulu?
child.chore.harvesting.nohoe: Aku tidak memiliki cangkul untuk memanen.
adult.chore.mining.orenotify: Aku menemukan sesuatu! Ada beberapa %2$s di dekat sini.
adult.chore.fishing.norod: Aku tidak lagi memiliki tongkat pancing.
adult.chore.hunting.nosword: Aku kehilangan pedangku! Apakah kamu punya satu lagi?
adult.chore.harvesting.nohoe: Aku tidak memiliki cangkul untuk memanen.
interaction.marry.fail.isbaby: You are trying to marry a kid... what?
spouse.interaction.marry.fail.marriedtog: Ini cincin yang indah, tapi aku sudah menikah denganmu, konyol.
Kita sudah menikah. Apa kamu lupa?
adult.interaction.marry.fail.marriedtoot: Maafkan aku, tidak... Aku sudah menikah.
Oh, kupikir kamu sudah tau... Aku sudah menikah dengan orang lain.
adult.interaction.marry.fail.playermarri: Uh... Aku melihat cincin di jarimu. Kamu sudah menikah!
Apa yang kamu coba lakukan? Kamu sudah menikah!
Apa? Sungguh? Aku pikir kamu sudah menikah dengan orang lain, bukan?
Aku terkejut! Kamu sudah memiliki pasangan.
adult.interaction.marry.fail.lowhearts/2: Oh, cincin yang indah! Oh tunggu... itu untukku? Um... tidak.
adult.interaction.marry.fail.lowhearts/3: Apakah itu untukku? Maaf, aku tidak cukup mengenalmu.
adult.interaction.marry.fail.lowhearts/4: Aku tersanjung, tapi aku tidak begitu mengenalmu.
adult.interaction.marry.fail.isparent/1: Tolong jangan lakukan itu dengan keluarga...
adult.interaction.marry.fail.isparent/2: Aku cukup yakin itu bukan cara kerjanya.
adult.interaction.marry.fail.isparent/3: Menurut Ensiklopedi Kehidupan, inses itu ilegal. Jadi tidak.
spouse.interaction.engage.success/1: Ya! Aku akan nikah dengan kamu! Aku cintaimu!
spouse.interaction.engage.success/2: Tentu saja aku akan menikah denganmu!
spouse.interaction.engage.success/3: Sudah waktunya kamu lakukan itu... bercanda dong! Aku cintaimu!
spouse.interaction.engage.success/4: Apakah...apakah ini nyata? Maksudku, momen ini, bukan cincinnya. Tapi cincinnya nyata, kan?
spouse.interaction.marry.success/1: Ini mimpi menjadi kenyataan! Aku akan mencintaimu selamanya!
spouse.interaction.marry.success/2: Kita akhirnya telah menikah! Sekarang apa?
spouse.interaction.marry.success/4: Aku tidak sabar untuk memulai kehidupan kita bersama!
adult.interaction.matchmaker.fail.marrie: Aku sudah menikah dengan orang lain.
Aku sudah bahagia menikah dengan orang lain, aku tidak ingin pasangan lain.
Aku tidak mau itu - aku sudah menikah dengan orang lain.
adult.interaction.matchmaker.fail.engage: Aku sudah bertunangan dengan orang lain, aku tidak bisa mengambil cincin itu.
Aku sudah berjanji untuk menikah dengan seseorang lain.
Oh, terima kasih tapi aku nggak apa-apa. Aku sudah bertunangan dengan orang lain.
adult.interaction.matchmaker.fail.needtw: Bukannya kamu perlu dua cincin untuk mengatur sebuah pernikahan?
Oh, oke! Tapi kamu butuh dua cincin dulu.
Kamu akan membutuhkan dua cincin untuk pasanganku dan aku, tapi kamu hanya punya satu.
adult.interaction.matchmaker.fail.novill: Aku tidak melihat siapa pun di dekat sini. Siapa yang kamu ingin aku menikahi?
Aku tidak tahu... pindahkan aku lebih dekat ke orang yang menurut kamu tepat untukku.
Oh, tapi sepertinya tidak ada yang di dekat sini. Siapa yang seharusnya aku nikahi?
adult.interaction.sethome.success/1: Oke, ini akan menjadi titik rumahku yang baru.
adult.interaction.sethome.success/2: Aku mengerti, aku akan tidur di sini malam ini.
spouse.interaction.sethome.success/1: Aku suka banget tempat ini, kerja yang bagus %1$s!
childp.interaction.sethome.success/2: Ini keren. Aku boleh main gak sekarang?
childp.interaction.sethome.success/3: Oke, tapi aku mau kamar paling besar!
interaction.sethome.fail/1: Ini tidak terlihat seperti titik rumah yang aman untuk aku.
interaction.sethome.fail/2: Apakah ada tempat lain di dekat sini?
interaction.sethome.bedfail/1: Rumah bagus, tapi sepertinya semua tempat tidur sudah dipakai.
interaction.sethome.bedfail/2: Tidak ada tempat tidur kosong di sini!.
interaction.sethome.bedfail.infirmary/1: This is a infirmary, the bed is reserved for sick people.
interaction.sethome.bedfail.blocked/1: This building has been marked as blocked.
adult.interaction.sethangout.success/1: Ini tempat favoritku. Aku sering ke sini di malam hari.
child.interaction.sethangout.success/1: Yaudah! Aku akan main di sini sebelum waktunya tidur.
childp.interaction.sethangout.success/1: Yaudah! Aku akan main di sini sebelum waktunya tidur.
adult.interaction.gohome.success/1: Baik, aku akan segera ke sana!
spouse.interaction.gohome.success/1: Oke, sayang, aku akan pulang sekarang.
child.interaction.gohome.success/1: Oke! Sepertinya aku ingat dimana aku tinggal...
spouse.interaction.gohome.fail.nohome: Ingatkan aku lagi rumah kita dimana?
child.interaction.gohome.fail.nohome: Aku tidak ingat dimana aku tinggal...
childp.interaction.gohome.fail.nohome: Aku tidak ingat dimana rumah kita! Kita terlalu sering pindah!
childp.interaction.ridehorse.fail.notnea: Dimana kuda aku? Aku harap aku tidak hilangin lagi...
adult.interaction.ridehorse.fail.notnear: Aku tidak melihat kuda yang aku bisa naikki di dekat sini.
spouse.interaction.ridehorse.fail.notnea: Dimana kuda aku, sayang? Aku tidak bisa menemukannya.
spouse.interaction.procreate.fail.hasbab: Kita sudah mempunyai bayi...kamu tidak kehilangannya kan?!
...kamu kehilangan bayi Joby ya? Tunggu...apakah nama dia Joby?
spouse.interaction.procreate.fail.lostba: Did you loose our baby?!? Oh, he is right here, silly.
Our neighbours found our baby. Please be more careful.
That is the last time I search for our baby!
spouse.interaction.procreate.fail.lowhea: Habiskan lebih banyak waktu denganku! Aku tidak siap untuk mempunyai anak.
Hmm...jangan dulu. Kayaknya kita masih harus menghabiskan lebih banyak waktu bersama dulu.
interaction.adopt.success: That's my happiest day of my life!
armor.enabled: Okay, I will always wear my armor. If I have any.
armor.disabled: Fine, I will only wear my armor in case we are under attack.
profession.set.none: Alright, I will find myself a job soon.
profession.set.guard: I am honored to serve as a guard protecting this village.
profession.set.archer: I will join the defense of the village as an archer.
adult.gift.cake.success/1: Apa ini? Kue? Oh...astaga. Aku...harus mencari pasanganku.
adult.gift.cake.success/2: Kue! Kamu baik sekali! Aku...tunggu, apa perasaan aneh ini?
adult.gift.cake.success/3: Akhirnya, sesuatu yang akan membantu pernikahanku...
adult.gift.cake.fail/1: Kurasa aku sudah tidak ingin kue lagi, tapi terima kasih.
adult.gift.cake.fail/2: Tidak, terima kasih. Aku sudah tidak ingin kue.
gift.confectionary.fail/1: Aku tidak terlalu punya gigi manis
gift.confectionary.fail/2: Aku yakin tukang kue akan lebih menyukai ini.
gift.confectionary.best/2: Ini persis apa yang aku butuhkan!
child.gift.confectionary.fail: Mama katanya aku tidak boleh makan yang manis-manis...
gift.gluten.fail: There is gluten in it! Do you want me to have diarrhea for the rest of the year?
gift.meats.fail/2: You know that I hate meat!
gift.lactose.fail: Sorry, but I am lactose intolerant.
gift.flowers.good/2: Aku harap kamu tidak mengambil itu dari kebunku
gift.fish.fail/3: Ikan. Kamu memberi aku. Ikan. Kenapa?
gift.fish.good/1: Ini akan menghematkan waktuku. Terima kasih.
gift.fish.better: Wah. Kamu menghabiskan semua waktu itu hanya untuk aku?
gift.fish.best/2: Ini persis apa yang aku butuhkan!
colors.fail: I'm blind. What am I supposed to do with this?
gift.weapons.fail/1: Aku tidak pikir aku bisa, maaf
gift.weapons.fail/4: Aku lebih terlatih dengan cangkul daripada pedang
gift.weapons.success/3: I will sharpen it well, adventurer.
gift.plant.fail/1: Ini sangat indah, tapi aku tidak tahu apa aku lakukan dengan ini.
gift.plant.fail/2: Kenapa kamu tidak memberi ini ke petani?
gift.plant.best/2: Ini persis apa yang aku butuhkan!
gift.plant.best/4: Ini akan cocok di sebelah semak-semaknya.
adult.gift.fail/2: Apa yang membuat kamu pikir aku akan menyukai ini?
adult.gift.fail/4: Aku tidak ingin itu, mengapa aku ingin itu?
adult.gift.fail/6: Apakah ini kado? Tidak, terima kasih.
adult.gift.good/5: Kado? Untuk aku? Kamu baik sekali!
adult.gift.best/1: Aku...Aku tidak tahu berkata apa. Terima kasih banyak, %1$s!
adult.gift.best/2: Bagaimana kamu...lupakan saja, ini luar biasa!
adult.gift.best/4: Ini luar biasa! Aku akan menggunakannya dengan baik.
adult.gift.best/5: Terima kasih banyak. Aku akan mengingatkan ini selamanya.
child.gift.fail/3: Kenapa kamu memberi aku ini? Ini bodoh!
child.gift.better/1: Keren! Aku akan menunjukkan ini ke semua teman aku.
child.gift.better/2: Kamu menemukannya! Aku kehilangan ini beberapa menit yang lalu.
child.gift.better/3: Teman aku mencuri ini dari aku. Apa kamu menhajari dia untukku?
child.gift.best/2: Akhirnya! Temanku akan berhenti membual sekarang.
child.gift.best/4: Ayahku memiliki yang seperti ini. Sekarang aku mempunyainya juga!
spouse.gift.fail/2: Eh, apa ini seharusnya kado untukku?
spouse.gift.fail/3: Buang sampah kamu sendiri! Oh, ini kado?...maaf.
spouse.gift.fail/4: Aku kira kamu mengenali aku lebih baik dari itu. Aku membenci ini.
spouse.gift.good/3: Ini tidak diduga, terima kasih, sayang!
spouse.gift.better/2: Aku sangat menyukai ini! Terima kasih!
spouse.gift.better/4: Kamu mendapatkan ini untukku? Betapa manismu!
spouse.gift.best/3: Ini pasti mahal sekali! Terima kasih!
spouse.gift.best/4: Aku...tidak percaya kamu akan memberiku sesuatu yang begitu indah!
childp.gift.fail/2: Ih, aku pernah mendapatkan lebih bagus dari ini!
childp.gift.fail/3: Bukannya kamu memberi ini kepadaku tahun lalu?
childp.gift.fail/4: Aku bisa mendapatkan ini dengan mudah, terima kasih.
childp.gift.good/2: Apa ini ulang tahunku? Ini luar biasa!
childp.gift.good/3: This is much better than the last gift I got!
childp.gift.good/4: Woo hoo! It's mine, all mine!
childp.gift.better/3: I really like this one, can I have another?
childp.gift.better/4: All of my friends will be jealous now!
childp.gift.better/5: This is so cool! I've wanted one of these forever!
childp.gift.best/1: This must have cost a fortune!
childp.gift.best/2: I knew you would get me one of these. I just knew it!
childp.gift.best/3: Yay! I have the best parents in the world!
childp.gift.best/4: This is so amazing! I can't believe this is all mine!
childp.gift.best/5: Thank you so much! You're the best ever!
spouse.endmarriage/1: Aku selesai. Kamu tidak merawat aku dengan baik. Aku meninggalkan kamu!
spouse.endmarriage/2: Aku pergi. Selamanya! Jangan mencari aku.
spouse.endmarriage/3: Maaf - Aku pikir kita bisa memperbaiki semuanya, tapi ini tidak bekerja dengan aku. Selamat tinggal.
spouse.endmarriage/4: %1$s, ini selamat tinggal. Jangan mencoba ikuti aku.
adult.dialogue.main/4: What's going on with you today?
spouse.dialogue.main/1: Hi honey, where have you been?
spouse.dialogue.main/2: Hello dear, how is your day going?
spouse.dialogue.main/4: Hey %1$s! You look hungry. Would you like me to cook something?
adult.dialogue.hug.success/3: At least one thing made my day today.
adult.dialogue.hug.success/4: You're as snuggly as a sheep!
adult.dialogue.hug.fail/1: You're covered in soot and mud!
adult.dialogue.hug.fail/4: After you called me a dinosaur last week? No.
adult.dialogue.hug.fail/5: Quite frankly, you don't deserve a hug after you did that.
spouse.dialogue.hug.success/1: I love being entangled in your arms!
spouse.dialogue.hug.success/3: Would you rather only being able to hug or kiss?
spouse.dialogue.hug.fail/1: Why don't you go hug your ex?
childp.dialogue.hug.success/2: I'm going to be as strong as you are one day!
childp.dialogue.hug.success/4: I love hugs! You're soft and warm!
childp.dialogue.hug.fail/2: Stop it! I don't want people to see!
childp.dialogue.hug.fail/4: Just leave me alone or give me some cookies!
adult.dialogue.kiss.success/1: I wish this moment would last forever.
spouse.dialogue.kiss.success/1: I fall in love all over again when our lips meet!
spouse.dialogue.kiss.success/2: Time stops ticking when I'm with you.
spouse.dialogue.kiss.success/5: I wouldn't trade you for anyone in the world!
spouse.dialogue.kiss.fail/1: Not where someone can see us...
spouse.dialogue.kiss.fail/2: We don't have to if you don't want to.
spouse.dialogue.kiss.fail/3: Your breath smells like wolf kibble.
spouse.dialogue.kiss.fail/4: Go take a drink from the lake.
spouse.dialogue.kiss.fail/5: Now that we're married I can tell you how lousy you are at kissing.
adult.dialogue.chat.success/1: Man, cookies and milk does sound delicious right now.
adult.dialogue.chat.success/2: Yes, I suppose the weather is nice today.
adult.dialogue.chat.success/3: I'm doing just fine! Hit my toe when I woke up, though.
adult.dialogue.chat.success/4: An apple a day keeps the zombies away!
adult.dialogue.chat.success/5: My dream is to build my own village, but I'm so lazy.
adult.dialogue.chat.success/6: I think I saw %Supporter% the other day in Diamond armor.
adult.dialogue.chat.success/7: My friend %Supporter% told me that they found a chest full of diamonds yesterday!
adult.dialogue.chat.fail/1: Did you seriously just say that?
adult.dialogue.chat.fail/2: I don't believe it exploded on its own.
adult.dialogue.chat.fail/3: You know, you're not that cool.
adult.dialogue.chat.fail/5: You should be thrown in a dungeon!
child.dialogue.chat.success/1: I heard stories about you! Are you a hero?
child.dialogue.chat.success/2: Hi. I was going to go try and climb to the roof.
child.dialogue.chat.success/3: Do you wanna go burn stuff with me?
child.dialogue.chat.success/4: I'm going to be a hunter like you and kill many things!
child.dialogue.chat.success/5: Hi! What are you doing today? I'm going swimmin'!
child.dialogue.chat.fail/1: If you don't give me cookies I'll hold my breath.
child.dialogue.chat.fail/2: My parents said not to talk to you, that you're bad.
child.dialogue.chat.fail/4: Oh yeah? Well I'm gonna egg your house!
spouse.dialogue.chat.success/1: I cleaned the entire house. How was your day?
spouse.dialogue.chat.success/2: Honey, let's go camping sometime. Doesn't that sound like fun?
spouse.dialogue.chat.success/3: So today I saw a spider. It was huge so I ran away.
spouse.dialogue.chat.success/4: We should build a new house together!
spouse.dialogue.chat.success/5: I almost walked into a lava pit the other day. That wouldn't have been good!
spouse.dialogue.chat.fail/1: I know we're not the poorest family, but...
spouse.dialogue.chat.fail/2: I love being around you but I need some space.
spouse.dialogue.chat.fail/3: Sometimes I wish I had my own "cave" to escape from you and everyone.
spouse.dialogue.chat.fail/4: Go away, I'm not in the mood.
spouse.dialogue.chat.fail/5: Where have you been? Are you seeing someone behind my back?
childp.dialogue.chat.success/1: Oh, I was just going to go explorin' later.
childp.dialogue.chat.success/3: Hi, can you make me a cake?
childp.dialogue.chat.success/4: Can I have my own room away from our house? That would be cool!
childp.dialogue.chat.success/5: Let's move into a cave! That sounds so fun!
childp.dialogue.chat.fail/2: I don't think I'd like that very much.
childp.dialogue.chat.fail/3: Is that why I've heard so much about "divorce"? What does that mean?
childp.dialogue.chat.fail/5: I don't want a baby sister.
adult.dialogue.story.success/1: Really? I can't believe that all happened!
adult.dialogue.story.success/2: I wish I was brave enough to take on a creeper.
adult.dialogue.story.success/3: That was a really good story! Is it original?
adult.dialogue.story.success/4: All of that happened yesterday? No way!
adult.dialogue.story.success/5: I was near there yesterday, I can't believe I didn't hear this already.
adult.dialogue.story.success/6: Haha! That definitely sounds like %Supporter%! Such an awesome person.
adult.dialogue.story.success/7: I've heard the Legend of %Supporter% almost a million times. Tell me again!
adult.dialogue.story.fail/1: *Ahem* That's my mother you're talking about.
adult.dialogue.story.fail/2: This is why the village talks about you.
adult.dialogue.story.fail/4: You're terrible! Creepers have feelings too!
adult.dialogue.story.fail/5: How could you kill a poor sheep?!
child.dialogue.story.success/2: I want to be just like you when I grow up. Shh, don't tell dad.
child.dialogue.story.success/3: Can you adopt me?! You're awesome!
child.dialogue.story.success/4: I went fishing and almost drowned.
child.dialogue.story.success/5: Does this mean I can take whatever I want? I mean, "borrow?"
child.dialogue.story.fail/2: I'm telling my mom what you said about her...
child.dialogue.story.fail/3: I believe you're speaking about my grandpa...
child.dialogue.story.fail/4: You're nothing but a scaredycat like dad said!
child.dialogue.story.fail/5: How could you kill a poor chicken?
spouse.dialogue.story.success/1: Let's not tell our children that one...
spouse.dialogue.story.success/2: You were so rebellious! I love it!
spouse.dialogue.story.success/3: Did you ever tell your parents about losing their rings?
spouse.dialogue.story.success/4: It was that moment when I fell in love with you!
spouse.dialogue.story.success/5: Wow, you're the best hunter ever!
spouse.dialogue.story.fail/1: Talk to me when you kill something other than a harmless cow.
spouse.dialogue.story.fail/3: You have a family to think about!
spouse.dialogue.story.fail/4: ...If you liked them why didn't you marry them, instead?
spouse.dialogue.story.fail/5: Why did you wear the pink fluffy underwear? Whose were they?
childp.dialogue.story.success/1: What!? You really did that?! But...what happened to your friend?
childp.dialogue.story.success/2: I want to explore a cave, too! Let's go!
childp.dialogue.story.success/3: One day I'll kill more creepers than you!
childp.dialogue.story.success/4: Oh, oh, oh! Can we climb a tree, too?!
childp.dialogue.story.fail/1: I don't want to hear about grandma.
childp.dialogue.story.fail/2: You always say that. I just want a pet.
childp.dialogue.story.fail/3: You're just fibbing. I don't belive that.
childp.dialogue.story.fail/4: You said you didn't eat the cake and cookies...
childp.dialogue.story.fail/5: Someone said you were a bad person, and I believe them!
adult.dialogue.flirt.success/2: Oh, you! Stop being so cute!
adult.dialogue.flirt.success/5: That was so adorable! You had me at "hello"!
adult.dialogue.flirt.fail/1: If you mean that, then prove it.
adult.dialogue.flirt.fail/2: Aw.... Wait, you told the baker the same thing!
adult.dialogue.flirt.fail/5: A zombie has a better chance than you.
spouse.dialogue.flirt.success/1: *Blushes* Well, how about we do something like that, then!
spouse.dialogue.flirt.success/2: Aw, you said that when we first met.
spouse.dialogue.flirt.fail/2: This one is getting old... like you.
spouse.dialogue.flirt.fail/3: We're married, we don't have to do this anymore.
spouse.dialogue.flirt.fail/4: Talk to the tree, it cares more.
spouse.dialogue.flirt.fail/5: Yeah, yeah... What was it you were saying?
dialogue.joke.skeleton.failed: Skeletons are sentient beings! How dare you!
dialogue.joke.sheep.success/1: Unfortunate for the sheep to lose its wool, but funny!
dialogue.joke.sheep.success/2: Then the wolf fell in love with the sheep.
dialogue.joke.sheep.failed/1: That poor sheep! That's not funny at all!
dialogue.joke.pig.failed/1: Don't speak about my pig like that!
dialogue.joke.creative.success/3: That's the best I have ever heard!
dialogue.joke.creative.failed/3: Ah, you're not the funniest in town.
child.dialogue.joke.creative.success/4: I'm tellin' my momma that one! *Laughs*
spouse.dialogue.joke.creative.success/1: *Laughs* I married you for your humor!
spouse.dialogue.joke.creative.success/2: You should throw an egg at him next time!
spouse.dialogue.joke.creative.success/4: Here's one for you... How many chickens does a creeper blow up?
spouse.dialogue.joke.creative.fail/4: You need to erase that from your mind.
childp.dialogue.joke.creative.success/2: I've got to tell my friend that one!
childp.dialogue.joke.creative.success/4: *Laughs*Why is there no longer 3 of them?
childp.dialogue.joke.creative.fail/1: I thought you were funny, though...
childp.dialogue.joke.creative.fail/2: I like knock knock jokes better.
childp.dialogue.joke.creative.fail/3: I don't get it, that was dumb.
childp.dialogue.joke.creative.fail/4: *Yawn* My friend's dad is cooler and funnier than you.
dialogue.greet: Hey! How are you doing today?
dialogue.greet.getBetter/1: Aww, I hope whatever you're dealing with gets better
adult.shake_hand.success/2: Your grip shows me you have great power!
adult.shake_hand.fail/1: Seriously? After you slaughtered the cow?
adult.shake_hand.fail/3: I'm not a stranger, you don't have to be so polite.
adult.shake_hand.fail/4: Wow really? This isn't like you.
child.shake_hand.success/1: Hiya! Someone I know likes you...
child.shake_hand.success/2: Dad said this is a very nice thing to do.
child.shake_hand.success/3: Now high five! Down low... too slow!
child.shake_hand.success/5: *Giggles* I just cleaned a cow with this hand.
child.shake_hand.fail/2: Mom, dad! This person is trying to kidnap me!
child.shake_hand.fail/4: Ew, your hand has black stuff on it.
child.shake_hand.fail/5: I'll only shake your hand if you give me a diamond.
spouse.shake_hand.success/3: One day people will forget to shake hands.
spouse.shake_hand.success/4: Our children will need to be this polite.
spouse.shake_hand.success/5: *Continues to shake hand* Tell me when to stop!
spouse.shake_hand.fail/1: shake_hand? How about a kiss, instead?
spouse.shake_hand.fail/3: Your hand is nasty, no way.
spouse.shake_hand.fail/5: Why don't you get a decent job instead of shaking my hand?
childp.shake_hand.success/1: Why do I need to learn this stuff?
childp.shake_hand.success/2: I heard that this is a polite thing to do.
childp.shake_hand.success/3: I'm gonna be just like you when I grow up!
childp.shake_hand.success/5: I don't get it, but okay!
childp.shake_hand.fail/4: I'll shake your hand if you give me cake.
childp.shake_hand.fail/5: No, you'll slip and hit me.
dialogue.divorce: Do you really want a divorce? A cleric can provide divorce papers to decrease penalties.
dialogue.procreate: Do you really want a child?
dialogue.adopt: Do you really want to be my parent?
dialogue.divorcePapers: Here you go, bring these papers to your spouse to confirm the divorce.
